item.title: Drush and Homestead Vagrant Box
item.description: Had some trouble doing the normal composer install so I went with the manual install noted here https://github.com/drush-ops/drush Basically I downloaded and unzipped the repo to /usr/local/sbin. Then I did a symlink to /usr/bin cd /usr/bin sudo ln -s /usr/local/sbin/drush/drush . Then in /usr/local/sbin/drush I ran sudo composer install
